title: Preferred online retail payment methods worldwide 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Payment Method, and Share of online shoppers in each Payment Method on the y axis.
Payment Method Credit cards has the highest Share of online shoppers and Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) has the lowest Share of online shoppers.
The difference of Share of online shoppers between the highest and lowest Payment Method is 39.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Payment Method in the x axis and Share of online shoppers in the y axis.
The Share of online shoppers is highest at Payment Method Credit cards and lowest at Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
Second maximum Share of online shoppers is found at Payment Method .
The difference of Share of online shoppers between the highest and lowest Payment Method is 39.0.
Payment Method Credit cards is higher than any other Payment Methods with value 42.0, followed by , and Debit cards. Down to Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) with the lowest value 3.0.
Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin), and Other have the same Share of online shoppers.
Considered together, the average Share of online shoppers in all 9 Payment Methods is roughly 20.78.
The Share of online shoppers is 187.0 if we add up values of all Payment Methods.
